comment: Send at least million to Germany to save our asses from Merkel's nuthouse government, please. Most if not all should know their way around .
amr:
# ::snt Send at least million to Germany to save our asses from Merkel's nuthouse government, please. Most if not all should know their way around .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / send-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (a / at-least
                  :op1 1000000)
            :ARG2 (c / country
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Germany"))
            :purpose (s2 / save-02
                  :ARG0 (w / we
                        :part (a2 / ass))
                  :ARG1 a2
                  :ARG2 (g / government-organization
                        :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01)
                        :mod (n2 / nuthouse)
                        :poss (p / person
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Merkel")))))
      :snt2 (r / recommend-01
            :ARG1 (k / know-01
                  :ARG0 (p2 / person
                        :ARG1-of (ii / include-91
                              :ARG3 (m2 / most))
                        :ARG2-of ii
                        :ARG1 (w2 / way
                              :path (a3 / around))))
            :ARG2 p2))

comment: Completely sane attitude. I don't see anybody else either willing or capable of cleaning up this mess. Putin maybe. Not the contemporary German men, that's for sure.
amr:
# ::snt Completely sane attitude. I don't see anybody else either willing or capable of cleaning up this mess. Putin maybe. Not the contemporary German men, that's for sure.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / attitude
            :mod (s / sane
                  :ARG1-of (c / complete-02)))
      :snt2 (s2 / see-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (a2 / anybody
                  :mod (e / else)
                  :ARG0-of (w / will-02
                        :ARG1 (c2 / clean-up-02
                              :ARG1 (m2 / mess
                                    :mod (t / this))))
                  :mod (e2 / either)))
      :snt3 (p / possible-01
            :ARG1 (p2 / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Putin")))
      :snt4 (s3 / sure-02
            :ARG1 (m3 / man
                  :polarity -
                  :mod (c3 / contemporary)
                  :mod (c4 / country
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Germany")))))

# ::snt Stop using religious based insults.
(s / stop-01
      :mode imperative
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 (u / use-01
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 (ii / insult-01
                  :ARG1-of (b / base-02
                        :ARG2 (r / religion)))))

comment: Religion-targeted hate ("muzzies") and neo-fascism ("reinstitute...the SS") are sufficiently odious to warrant a ban here.
amr:
# ::snt Religion-targeted hate ("muzzies") and neo-fascism ("reinstitute...the SS") are sufficiently odious to warrant a ban here.
(o / odious
      :domain (a / and
            :op1 (h / hate-01
                  :ARG1-of (t / target-01
                        :ARG2 (r / religion)))
            :op2 (p / political-movement
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "neo-fascism")
                  :ARG1-of (m / mean-01
                        :ARG2 (r2 / reinstate-01
                              :ARG1 (o2 / organization
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "SS"))))))
      :ARG2-of (h2 / have-degree-91
            :ARG1 a
            :ARG3 (e / enough)
            :ARG6 (w / warrant-01
                  :ARG1 (b / ban-01
                        :location (h3 / here)))))

comment: Using slang words for groups of people makes it difficult for others to understand what you are saying, use proper names.
amr:

(a / and
      :op1 (m / make-02
            :ARG0 (u / use-01
                  :ARG1 (w / word
                        :mod (s / slang))
                  :ARG2 (g / group
                        :consist-of (p / person)))
            :ARG1 (d / difficult
                  :domain (u2 / understand-01
                        :ARG0 (o / other)
                        :ARG1 (t / thing
                              :ARG1-of (s2 / say-01
                                    :ARG0 (y / you))))))
      :op2 (u3 / use-01
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 t
            :ARG2-of (n / name-01)
            :mod (p2 / proper)))
